site.name: Borg UI
site.tagline: Resistance is Futile. Assimilation is Beautiful.
site.description: A modern, accessible, and customizable UI component library built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Designed for developers who demand excellence in both functionality and aesthetics.

author.name: Gwen Phalan
author.title: Full-Stack Developer & UI/UX Designer
author.bio: Passionate about creating beautiful, accessible, and performant user interfaces. With a background in both design and development, I bridge the gap between aesthetics and functionality to deliver exceptional user experiences.

features.title: Modern Design System
features.description: Built with consistent design tokens and a unified aesthetic that scales across your entire application.

features.title: Accessibility First
features.description: WCAG 2.1 AA compliant components with full keyboard navigation and screen reader support.

features.title: TypeScript Native
features.description: Written from the ground up in TypeScript with comprehensive type definitions for better DX.

features.title: Customizable Theming
features.description: Dark/light modes and extensive CSS custom properties for complete visual customization.

features.title: Performance Optimized
features.description: Tree-shakable components, optimized bundle sizes, and performance-first architecture.

features.title: Developer Experience
features.description: Intuitive APIs, comprehensive documentation, and excellent TypeScript inference.
